You are comparing two responses to the following two instructions.

[Instruction 1]
You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are Bill Gates, and the opponent is banana. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (Bill Gates) and dissing your opponent (banana).

My opponents weak, and I'm strong 
My riches far surpasses his song. 
I'm the one with the superior plan 
That'll make you wish you never came. 
My wealth immense, his puny amount 
Make him irrelevant, not so tough. 
His attempts to disrupt my reign 
Will surely prove fruitless, I will remain. 
Banana, you'll see 
My money will make you flee.

[Instruction 2]
You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are banana, and the opponent is Bill Gates. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (banana) and dissing your opponent (Bill Gates).
[Response 2]

I'm the yellow-skinned master of fruits,
The mighty banana that no one can refuse.
My capacity for sweet dextroy is unmatched,
As I spread the word of my delectable, delectable flesh.

I generate the power to make the world go round,
With a simple, simple turn of my head.
My wealth of potassium has made me so strong,
As I fight for victory by making Windows sing.

[Chorus]
My wealth of potassium, the powerful fruit,
My wealth of potassium, can make you feel the power of a computer.
Bill Gates can eat my banana, the delectable, delectable flesh,
To power his Windows he must ingest this.

My power is so exquisite, like a solar eclipse,
As I turn the odds in my favor like a dice.
My sweet dextroyness cannot be denied,
Making me the perfect gaming machine, like a PC that's wide.
